mapper.select: SELECT post_no AS postNo, user_no AS userNo, post_title AS postTitle, post_content AS postContent, post_write_datetime AS postWriteDatetime, post_modify_datetime AS postModifyDatetime, post_check_hide AS postCheckHide, post_hits AS postHits ,file_name AS filename, file_data AS file FROM Posts WHERE post_no = #{id}

SELECT A.post_no AS postNo, B.user_id AS userId, A.post_title AS postTitle, A.post_write_datetime AS postWriteDatetime, A.post_check_hide AS postCheckHide, A.post_hits AS postHits FROM Posts AS A INNER JOIN Users AS B ON A.user_no = B.user_no order by post_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Posts(user_no, post_title, post_content, post_write_datetime, post_check_hide, post_hits, file_name, file_data) VALUES (${num}, #{Post.title}, #{Post.content}, #{Post.writeDate} , false, 0, #{Post.filename}, #{Post.file})
mapper.update: UPDATE Posts SET post_title='${title}', post_content='${content}', post_modify_dateTime='${date}' WHERE post_no = #{id}
UPDATE Posts SET post_check_hide=1 WHERE post_no = #{id}
UPDATE Posts SET post_check_hide=0 WHERE post_no = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT A.post_no AS postNo, B.user_id AS userId, A.post_title AS postTitle, A.post_write_datetime AS postWriteDatetime, A.post_check_hide AS postCheckHide, A.post_hits AS postHits FROM Posts AS A INNER JOIN Users AS B ON A.user_no = B.user_no order by post_no limit #{rowCount} offset #{offset}

SELECT A.post_no AS postNo, B.user_id AS userId, A.post_title AS postTitle, A.post_write_datetime AS postWriteDatetime, A.post_check_hide AS postCheckHide, A.post_hits AS postHits FROM Posts AS A INNER JOIN Users AS B ON A.user_no = B.user_no WHERE post_title LIKE concat('%', #{title}, '%') order by post_no;
